title: IDE Workspace Configuration

detailed_design.description: Optimise Cursor/VS Code workspace for better performance and developer experience. Exclude virtual environments and node_modules from indexing and search.
detailed_design.solution: 1. Add my-agent-venv to explorer.excludeFromDelete and files.exclude. 2. Add search.exclude for node_modules, .next, venv, my-agent-venv, __pycache__, .git. 3. Set python.analysis.indexing: false. 4. Add python.analysis.exclude for venvs and node_modules.

acceptance_criteria: my-agent-venv excluded from explorer and file operations
Python analysis excludes venvs for faster startup

user_stories.story: As a developer, I want the IDE to perform well without indexing 770MB+ of dependencies.

technical_notes.current_issue: Cursor/VS Code was indexing venv and node_modules causing slowdowns
